name: My 2D parkour game.
description:
Movemnt:

Arrows left/right - Move left and right.

Jump - Space.

Crouch - down arrow key.

Slide - run any direction and press down arrow key.

Wall Slide - hold arrow key to wall direction.

Wall jump - hold arrow key to wall direction and press space.

Wall run - ONLY on the pink wall, press up arrow key rapidly.
